title: Introduction to CS Lewis' Miracles and the Socratic Club
description:
From the beginning of my work on Jordan Peterson I thought that CS Lewis would be a good guide through the issues that Peterson raises. Before I begin with Lewis I want to introduce Lewis' participation with the Socratic Club at Oxford which helped form the Lewis that would write this book. 

Alistar McGrath Lewis Biography https://www.amazon.com/C-Lewis-Life-Eccentric-Reluctant/dp/1496410459/

Miroslav Volf on God's violence or ours https://paulvanderklay.me/2009/08/12/miroslav-volf-on-gods-violence-or-ours/
